about_the_game:
Achieve Gaming Supremacy with Glorious PC Master Aim's Custom Crosshairs.

Select or Design Your Ultimate Crosshair.
Behold a treasury of 200 different crosshairs to choose from, each bearing the insignia of superiority. But why stop there? Craft your own crosshair masterpiece—whether by drawing one yourself or importing an image. Every pixel becomes a testament to your proficiency over lesser gamers. Embrace the Gaming Master Race, and let your crosshair stand as a beacon of dominance amidst the chaos of battle.

Customize it to Fit Your Preferences.
Forge your signature mark upon the battlefield with an array of customization options. Size, position, rotation—every aspect of your crosshair is yours to tailor. Illuminate your crosshairs with a radiant glow, choosing colors that suit your style. Toggle visibility seamlessly. PC Master Aim empowers you to transcend mere aiming; It prompts you to exhibit your superiority with skill beyond compare.

Unlock Your Full Aiming Potential.
Elevate your skills to legendary status with the Aim Trainer, Hone your precision, sharpen your reflexes, and calculate your reaction time with a game designed to do just that, Undertake the journey of aim improvement as you rise through the ranks of the PC Master Race.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: PC Master Aim allows you to customize your crosshairs, offering a diverse range of pre-designed options and the ability to create new ones, tailoring each to perfectly match your preferences. Additionally, it offers an Aim Trainer to further enhance your aiming skills.
